programmes.show_description: Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases. S8, Ep244
Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases. S8, Ep245
A man sues his ex-girlfriend for vet bills and property destroyed by her dog Boo Boo despite the fact he is now the pet's owner. S16, Ep243
A woman and her daughter are suing an ex-friend claiming he illegally repossessed the car they purchased from him. S16, Ep244
A stay-at-home mother sues her unemployed ex-husband for money owed from their joint tax return. S16, Ep245
A woman sues her ex-boyfriend for loans to pay taxes on jackpot winnings, and to make his truck payment. S16, Ep246
A child breaks a TV when she hits the screen with a Wii remote; her parents are sued by their former friend for damages. S16, Ep247
A man sues his former friend for the cost of Dallas Cowboys' season tickets he purchased on her behalf; he claims she never gave him any money. S16, Ep248
A teenager insists he had no idea he was buying a stolen laptop from a man standing outside a convenience store who said he needed cash fast. S16, Ep249
Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases. S8, Ep239
Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases. S8, Ep240
The body of a man living under an assumed name is found tied to an anchor. Will his watch and tattoo be enough to identify him? S5, Ep17
The inspection of a woman's skull found in a lake reveals she was brutally butchered. S6, Ep16
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
A man descends into a life of seclusion and is later accused of killing his wife. But the marks found on her body could prove his innocence. S5, Ep9
Hot on the heels of a perpetrator, an investigator uses scientific knowledge to make an impression of his shoe print found in the snow. S6, Ep8
In a Texan hospital, more kids are dying than in any other hospital in the country. Police close in on a nurse who was on duty during the fatalities. S5, Ep10
When a young woman is found dead in her bedroom, investigators use clever technology to lift a fingerprint from her pillowcase. S6, Ep9
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
When an unreliable, drugged up prostitute witnesses an attack on a helpless girl, and an unidentified body is found, police wonder if the cases are connected. S5, Ep11
A six year old girl disappears during a Sunday church service and investigators close in on a taxi driver found in the vicinity. S6, Ep10
In 2014, in the small town of Cottonport, 29-year-old Megan Parra was discovered in her home by her parents, Missy and Steve Ducote, with a gunshot wound to her head. S36, Ep13
In 2018, intruders entered the home of wealthy jewellers Ted and Corey Shaughnessy in Austin, Texas. A gunfight left 55-year-old Ted Shaughnessy dead. S36, Ep14
Cayley Mandadi was a 19-year-old sophomore at Trinity University when she arrived at a hospital in Texas in 2017. She was nearly naked, bruised and wasn't breathing. S36, Ep15
In separate incidents, Britney Gulley and her friend Jeremisha Adams murder two men in cold blood and blind another with a shotgun blast to the face. S4, Ep10
The body of Patrice LaBlanc surfaces in a Texas Lake. She's been stabbed 39 times. Her boyfriend Cliff Youens turned cutting remarks into a knife-wielding rage. S5, Ep1
In April 1995, Louise Ellis leaves her Ottawa home to spend the weekend with her ex-boyfriend and his daughter in the Gatineau Hills. She is never seen again. S1, Ep1
When 72-year-old Toronto resident Harley Walker went missing, his worried friend Greg Seale walked to Harley's house and found a stranger opening the door. S1, Ep5

A mother of two toddlers sues a caretaker she found on Craig's List for the return of pre-paid babysitting fees. S16, Ep215
A love of country dancing unites a couple; a fight over an alleged assault on the dance floor and the return of a laptop tear them apart. S16, Ep216
The alleged theft of valuable Anime action figures, personal property and an arrest are disputed by ex-roommates. S16, Ep217
A woman sues her 17-year-old son's former boss for the return of money her son loaned her to have her car fixed. S16, Ep218
An alleged assault of a pregnant woman, an arrest, and private pictures of an ex-lover come into play when a relationship ends. S16, Ep219
Teen ex-lovers fight over custody of a Golden Labrador named Munch Munch; allegations of animal abuse are disputed. S16, Ep220
A woman accuses sober-living homeowners of illegally locking her out, filing false charges with CPS, and assault; they countersue for unpaid rent. S16, Ep221
A woman sues her ex-boyfriend 's brother for an unpaid loan to pay his child support. S16, Ep222
A teenager is accused of throwing underage parties and carving his name on the front door of his rental unit. His ex-landlord sues for damages. S16, Ep223
A woman with a shoe fetish admits she purchased ten pairs at a hotel shoe party; she then sues the seller for a refund claiming they hurt her feet. S16, Ep224
In April 1995, Louise Ellis leaves her Ottawa home to spend the weekend with her ex-boyfriend and his daughter in the Gatineau Hills. She is never seen again. S1, Ep1
When 72-year-old Toronto resident Harley Walker went missing, his worried friend Greg Seale walked to Harley's house and found a stranger opening the door. S1, Ep5
When the desk clerk of a beachfront condominium is found brutally murdered in the office utility room, police initially suspect the killer is someone close to her. S18, Ep2
An unfortunate soul is burnt to death when a house bursts into flames, but careful investigation reveals the fire was not an accident. S10, Ep1
It would be 50 years before a murderous criminal in California would be caught, thanks to advancements in computer technology and handwriting analysis. S10, Ep2
Investigators piece together tiny clues at the scene of a hit and run accident. Their findings help to track down the offending driver. S10, Ep3
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
When the wife of a reputable doctor goes missing, investigators discover the doctor house hunting with another woman claiming to be his wife. S5, Ep12
When a beautiful model goes missing, suspicious photographs are found in a dumpster. S6, Ep11
The latest forensic technology is used to analyse a postcard that could incriminate a religious figure who took part in war crimes. S5, Ep13
At the end of a murder mystery event, a real death occurs. S6, Ep12
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
Investigators turn to forensic evidence, when CCTV footage of a convenience store murder proves too fuzzy to be of any use. S5, Ep14
Whilst out riding with her husband, a woman dies in an apparent riding accident. S6, Ep13
Cyclist Moriah Wilson arrived in Austin, Texas, in May 2022 to prepare for the Gravel Locos bike race. One evening, her friend found Wilson had been shot multiple times. S36, Ep16
When Ray Wright suddenly lost contact with his family, they knew something was wrong. Two days later, his brother confronted an intruder in Ray Wright's home. S36, Ep17
After three murders with chillingly similar scenarios occurred in Austin, Texas, police began to wonder if they were chasing a serial killer, but no evidence was left. S31, Ep24
November, 2001 in Fort Worth, Texas, Loyd and Agnes Courtney were beaten and stabbed to death by their own daughter, Deborah Pieringer. Prosecutors say it was for money. S5, Ep2
In two months, 20 patients at a Texas hospital are murdered. Nurse Vickie Jackson is sentenced to life with no parole when she pleads 'no contest' to the murders. S5, Ep3
A woman disappears on her way to Seattle airport, her fianc√© makes an emotional appeal for her safe return. Two weeks later, her body is found in the trunk of her car. S3, Ep1
An Anchorage nurse disappears from her house and only her abandoned car is found. Local police enlist the help of the FBI to solve this baffling case. S3, Ep7

A woman is suing her former friend for a loan to buy Christmas gifts for her daughter and for unpaid credit card charges. S16, Ep226
A man sues his former tenant for utility bills and attorney fees he incurred when he evicted her. S16, Ep225
A woman is suing her former landlord for the return of her bicycle; she countersues for property damage, unpaid rent and copyright infringement.. S16, Ep227
A U.S. Army Reservist and his teenage wife are sued by his father for unpaid rent; dad claims they accused him of stealing their hamburger meat. S16, Ep228
A man sues his cousin's girlfriend for misappropriating money he gave her to make car payments. S16, Ep229
A man accuses his estranged son of stealing his truck and tools after he fell from a roof; the son claims his father assaulted him. S16, Ep230
